client.plugins

类 ClientPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • client.plugins.ClientPlugin
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, java.io.Serializable

    public class ClientPlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
    The class ClientPlugin implements a plug-in for the client component that provides the client with the services to connect to the sensor network and to send requests to the nodes in the network.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • installOn

        public void installOn(fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI owner)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI
        initialise the plug-in reference to its owner component and add to the component every specific information, ports, etc. required to run the plug-in.

        Contract

         pre     owner != null
 pre     getPluginURI() != null
 pre     !owner.isInstalled(getPluginURI())
 pre     getPreferredExecutionServiceURI() == null || owner.validExecutorServiceURI(getPreferredExecutionServiceURI())
 post    owner == getOwner()
 post    getPreferredExecutionServiceURI() == null || getPreferredExecutionServiceIndex() == ((AbstractComponent)owner).getExecutorServiceIndex(getPreferredExecutionServiceURI())
        指定者:
        installOn 在接口中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI
        覆盖:
        installOn 在类中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
        参数:
        owner - component on which the plug-in must be installed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        另请参阅:
        PluginI.installOn(fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI)

 post    isInitialised()
